original_title: Thompson Park Railway – 7¼” Gauge Society AGM
overview: In September 2017, the Thompson Park Railway played host to the Annual General Meeting of the 7¼” Gauge Society.  Produced by RailAdvent for the Thompson Park Railway and the 7¼” Gauge Society, this video contains an hours worth of high-quality content of all days of the event, which saw more than 40 locomotives descend on the miniature railway in Burnley.
title: Thompson Park Railway – 7¼” Gauge Society AGM
